title: URL Shortener
requirements: Support high read traffic and low redirect latency
hints: Cache hot links to avoid repeated DB lookups
Use a load balancer to spread API traffic

title: Realtime Chat
requirements: Deliver chat messages in near real-time
Absorb burst traffic during peak usage
hints: Queues smooth spikes between producers and consumers
Cache can reduce repeated history reads

title: Video Streaming
requirements: Serve video content with low startup delay
Store media reliably and process uploads asynchronously
hints: CDN is key for edge delivery
Object storage is usually the source of truth for media assets
